name: Pan-Fried Coconut King Salmon
author: margotbianca
summary: Pan-fried king salmon in a coconut crust.
ingredients: ½ pound skinless king salmon fillet, cut into small pieces and brought to room temperature
directions: Melt 1 1/2 tablespoons butter in a small microwave-safe bowl
Mix brown sugar, coconut, and salt together in a shallow bowl
Heat remaining butter in a cast iron skillet over medium-high heat
Dip each piece of salmon first into the melted butter and then into the coconut mixture; drop into the hot butter
Flip and sear on the other side, about 2 minutes more
Remove skillet from the heat and cover for a few minutes or until ready to serve; this helps caramelize the coconut crust
